resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Lack of musical gesture as performance: Gabi Losoncy doesn't perform during a concert, but simply plays a prerecorded track from her smartphone. A slightly more "active" performance by Gabi Losoncy can be found <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NXvgAXvxRVw" target="_blank" rel="noopener">here (Gabi recites a text thoughout the performance).
resource.chars: Lack of musical gesture as performance: Gabi Losoncy doesn't perform during a concert, but simply plays a prerecorded track from her smartphone. A slightly more "active" performance by Gabi Losoncy can be found here (Gabi recites a text thoughout the performance).
